beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 20
beats.narration: Mile 20. North Mountain Approach. First real test. Steep sustained climb on loose gravel. Loose surface punishes rhythm. Sets tone for constant.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.narration: Mile 58. Remote Backcountry Climbs. Series of punchy climbs in remote forest sections. No bail-out options. Cumulative fatigue from 5+ hours of.
